entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. POP 40%
